knimeNode.name: Labeling Properties
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node lists the properties of all labelings of an labeling column

fullDescription.intro: This node can list properties of labeling in an labeling column. It supports the number of dimensions, number of pixels, data type, number of labels, container type, etc

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select an image column which images shall be analyzed.
Select which properties shall be analyzed.
